# clickhousedbops_settings_profile (Data Source)





<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `name` (String) Settings profile name to look up (e.g. 'maxquery').

### Optional

- `cluster_name` (String) Cluster name for lookups on replicated/localfile setups.

### Read-Only

- `id` (String) UUID of the settings profile.
